translations.source: Select the file where to save the notes.
translations.translation: 选择用于保存笔记的文件

translations.source:
Organization

Duik is a comprehensive tool set for rigging and animation. This means there are a lot of tools available, but they are categorized in some useful panels, depending on what you're doing (animating, rigging, using cameras...)

Each panel can be displayed by clicking on one of the top buttons.
The first button, on the left, opens a very simple yet useful notes editor.

The other buttons display the available panels:

- Rigging
- Animation
- Camera
- Import and Export tools
- Settings
- Help

Help

If you need help, click on the top right button to open the contextual help, or hold the [Shift] button on your keyboard while clicking on any button to get some help.
translations.translation:
构架

Duik 是一组用于绑定和动画的综合工具集。这说明它不仅有大量可用的工具，且根据你正在做的事情（动画、绑定、摄像机设置……），这些工具被归类在了一些很有用的面板中。

每个面板都可以通过点击顶部的按钮来显示。
左起的第一个按钮，会开启一个非常简单但有用的笔记编辑器。

其它的按钮会显示可用的面板：

- 绑定
- 动画
- 相机
- 导入/导出工具
- 设置
- 帮助

帮助

如果你需要帮助，点击右上角的按钮获取文本帮助，或者按住 [Shift] 键同时点按任何按钮获取部分帮助。
简单的自动保存的记事本

translations.source: Exports the current language translation file for edition
translations.translation: 导出当前翻译语言用于编辑

translations.source: Use this mode if this is your first time with Duik (16).
translations.translation: 若你是第一次使用 Duik (16)，请使用该模式

translations.source: All features yet easy to use.
All features in a small and practical UI.
translations.translation: 全部功能集中在一个小而实用的 UI 上
在启动时显示最新消息

translations.source: Reloads Duik to apply settings changes.
translations.translation: 重载 Duik 以应用设置改变

translations.source: Add keyframes or edit selected keyframes
translations.translation: 添加关键帧或修改以选择的关键帧

translations.source: Pick ease and velocity from key
translations.translation: 从关键帧获取缓动和速度

translations.source: Set ease and velocity on selected keys
translations.translation: 对选中的帧设置缓动和速度
选择一个范围内的时间
选取当前的时间/工作区。

translations.source: Set linear in / bezier out spatial interpolation
translations.translation: 设为线性入/贝塞尔出空间插值

translations.source: Set bezier in / linear out spatial interpolation
translations.translation: 设为贝塞尔入/线性空间插值
自动让你的动画变得光滑
自动移除不需要的关键帧

translations.source: Replaces any existing keyframe on the properties before loading the new animation
translations.translation: 在载入新动画前，替换任何已存在于该属性上的关键帧
使用全部有动画的属性

translations.source: Create animation controllers for a camera.
translations.translation: 为一个相机创建动画控制器

translations.source: Links the distance of the layer from the camera to its scale, so its apparent size won't change.
translations.translation: 将图层的缩放关联至该层与摄像机之间的距离，来保持其视觉大小不变。

translations.source: Creates multiplane controllers to use as a 2D camera.
translations.translation: 创建多平面控制器作为 2D 摄像机使用。

translations.source: Adds handy grid and guides to help your framing and image composition.
translations.translation: 添加称手的网格和引导线帮助你校准图像和构想合成。

translations.source: Creates a controller for the camera
Precomposes the layers and animates the precomposition
translations.translation: 为层创建预合成，并在预合成上创建动画

translations.source: Animates the position of the layer
translations.translation: 为该层的位置创建动画

translations.source: Animates the anchor point of the layer (mimics TVPaint Camera)
translations.translation: 为图层的锚点创建动画（模仿 TVPaint 相机）
自动对层添加父子层级关系

translations.source: Automatically parents the layers to the camera
translations.translation: 自动将图层作为相机的子物体
导入一个 TVPaint 相机

translations.source: Import an animation previously exported as a CSV file from Krita.
translations.translation: 导入一个先前从 Krita 导出为 CSV 文件的动画
文本信息覆盖在画面上。

translations.source: Displays the text below the image.
translations.translation: 文本信息置于画面的底部。
不将镜头转化为预合成。
导入一个 storyboarder 工程

translations.source: Sets the sampling rate of the exported audio files.
translations.translation: 设置导出的音频文件的采样率。

translations.source: Sets the bitrate of the exported audio files.
translations.translation: 为导出的音频文件设置码流。

translations.source: Sets the channels of the master track.
Exports only the layers with active audio.
translations.translation: 仅导出具有激活的音频图层。

translations.source: Will transcode audio to ensure Audition compatibility.
translations.translation: 将音频转码来保证与 Audition 的兼容性。
在 Audition 中打开多轨混音

translations.source: Opens the session in Audition as soon as it is exported.
translations.translation: 导出后立刻打开 Audition 中的多轨混音。

translations.source: Exports a composition as an Audition session
translations.translation: 将一个合成导出为一个 Audition 的多轨合成

translations.source: Add a structure for a hominoid
Add a structure for an arm
Add a structure for a leg
Add a structure for a spine
Add a structure for a tail
Unlink elements' children to easily edit anchor points
translations.translation: 断开元素与子物体的链接，以方便调整锚点

translations.source: Select all structures found in the current composition
translations.translation: 选择所有在当前合成中找到的骨架
掌行动物（人类、灵长目、熊、兔子…）
趾行动物（狗、猫、恐龙、行走中的鸟…）

translations.source: Ungulate (horses, cattle, giraffes, pigs, deers, camels, hippopotamuses...)
translations.translation: 蹄行动物（马、牛、猪、鹿、骆驼、河马…）

translations.source: Removes expressions and effect for controlling the appearance of the Structure.\nThis will improve performance a little bit.
translations.translation: 移除控制骨架外观的表达式和控制器。\n略微提高运算速率。
自动化绑定和创建反向动力学

translations.source: Connect any property to any master property
translations.translation: 将任何属性连接至主控属性

translations.source: Setup a composition with the animation blender, to trigger animations with markers, and blend them together.
translations.translation: 设立一个具有动画混合器的合成，以便用标记触发动画，并将它们混合在一起。

translations.source: Connect any spatial property to a control layer
translations.translation: 将任何空间属性连接至一个控制层
将层链接在一起（可做动画）
在合成之间创建父子层关系

translations.source: Attach a layer to a bezier path
translations.translation: 将一个层吸附于一个贝塞尔路径

translations.source: Constraint a layer to the position of other layers
translations.translation: 将一个层约束至另一个层的位置

translations.source: Constrain the rotation of a layer to the orientation of other layers
translations.translation: 将一个层的旋转约束至另一个层的方向

translations.source: Add a list to the property
translations.translation: 向属性中加入一个列表

translations.source: Sets the animation, using the workarea.
Sets all the animated properties of the composition up.
translations.translation: 为合成中所有具有动画的属性设置本效果

translations.source: Sets all the selected properties of the composition up.
translations.translation: 为合成中所有选中的动画属性设置本效果

translations.source: Sets the properties and the blender up.
translations.translation: 为属性设置效果，并将它们混合起来。

translations.source: Parent the selected layers to the chosen layer.
translations.translation: 将选中的层作为给定层的子物体。

translations.source: Select two layers to measure the distance between them.
translations.translation: 选择两个图层来测量它们之间的距离。
向合成中添加一个“定位点”
从预合成中提取“定位点”

translations.source: Bake the appearance of the Structures, to improve performance
translations.translation: 烘焙骨架外观，来提高运算速率
当可用就使用标准反向动力学
偏好带回弹的正向动力学
当可用时就使用正向动力学
偏好贝塞尔反向动力学
当可用时就使用贝塞尔反向动力学
反向动力学与正向动力学

translations.source: Add an IK to the selected structure
translations.translation: 向选中的骨架添加一个反向动力学

translations.source: Add a Beizer IK to the selected structure
translations.translation: 向选中的骨架添加贝塞尔反向动力学
带自动回弹的正向动力学
1 或 2 图层反向动力学

translations.source: Rig long limbs combining 1-layer and 2-layer IKs
translations.translation: 混合 1 图层 和 2 图层的反向动力学来绑定长肢节
使用 3 图层的反向动力学绑定长肢节

translations.source: Select the path for the constraint
Removes expressions and effect for controlling the appearance of the Bone.\nThis will improve performance a little bit.
translations.translation: 移除控制骨骼外观的表达式和效果。\n这将略微提高运算速率。
连接至选中图层的不透明度

translations.source: Make the property swing between two values
translations.translation: 使属性在两个值之间摇摆

translations.source: Automate the rotation of a wheel
Randomizes all types of values and properties
translations.translation: 对任意类型的值和属性产生随机
程序化步行循环动画工具

translations.source: Use an effector to drive properties
translations.translation: 使用一个效果器来驱动属性

translations.source: Automate springs and bounces of a property
Move a layer away from its parent
translations.translation: 将一个层相对其其父层推开

translations.source: Defines loops before and after the keyframes
translations.translation: 定义关键帧之前和之后的循环

translations.source: Separate the dimension controls of the wiggle
translations.translation: 分离抖动所控制的维度

translations.source: Add one control for all properties
translations.translation: 为所有属性添加同一个控制

translations.source: Add one control for each property
translations.translation: 为每个属性都添加一个控制

translations.source: Randomizes the selected values (adding a keyframe if necessary)
translations.translation: 随机选中的值（若必要则添加一个关键帧）

translations.source: Randomizes the start times of the layers (moving them in time)
translations.translation: 随机图层的起始时间（在时间轴上移动它们）

translations.source: Randomizes the indices of the layers
Randomizes the in points of the layers
Randomizes the out points of the layers

translations.translation: 随机关键帧的时间点（将它们在时间轴上移动）

translations.source: Randomizes the values of the keyframes
Randomize all dimensions together (uses the X value)
translations.translation: 随机所有维度（使用 X 的值）

translations.source: Separate the dimension controls of the randomize
translations.translation: 分离随机所控制的维度

translations.translation: 从预合成中提取素有的控制器

translations.source: Use expressions to link the controllers to the precomp
translations.translation: 使用表达式将控制器链接至预合成

translations.source: Use master properties to link the controllers to the precomp
translations.translation: 使用主控属性将控制器链接至预合成
从预合成中提取控制器

translations.source: Removes expressions and effect for controlling the appearance of the Controller.\nThis will improve performance a little bit.
translations.translation: 移除控制控制器外观的表达式和效果。\n这将略微提高运算速率。

translations.source: Use shape layers to create beautiful controllers
translations.translation: 使用形状图层创建漂亮的控制器

translations.source: Use null objects to create simple controllers
translations.translation: 使用空物体创建简单的控制器

translations.source: Use the draft mode to create controllers and improve performance
translations.translation: 使用草图模式创建控制器，并提高运算速度

translations.source: Use the best quality to create controllers
translations.translation: 使用最佳质量创建控制器

translations.source: Measure the distance between two layers
Rename items in the project panel
translations.translation: 重命名工程面板的项目

translations.source: Do not update expressions after renaming
translations.translation: 在重命名之后不要更新表达式
在重命名之后更新表达式

translations.source: Search and replace text in expressions
translations.translation: 查找和替换表达式中的文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in sources of text layers
translations.translation: 查找和替换文本图层的源文本中的文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in layer names
translations.translation: 查找和替换图层名称中的文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in project item names
translations.translation: 查找和替换工程项目名中的文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in the active composition
translations.translation: 在的激活的工程中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in the whole project
translations.translation: 在整个工程中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in the selected layers only
translations.translation: 仅在选中的层中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in all layers
translations.translation: 在所有层中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in compositions
translations.translation: 在合成中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in footages
translations.translation: 在素材中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in folders
translations.translation: 在文件夹中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in all items
translations.translation: 在所有项目中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Search and replace text in the selected items only
translations.translation: 仅在选中的项目中查找和替换文本

translations.source: Blends different animations together,\nin an event-driven way.
translations.translation: 以事件驱动的方式，\n将不同的动画混合在一起.

translations.source: Add a motion trail for the selected layer
translations.translation: 为选中的层添加运动尾迹

translations.source: Change the exposure of the animation
Sets the animation to the blender layer.
translations.translation: 将动画设置至混合图层中

translations.source: Use an already existing layer for the motion trails, if any.
translations.translation: 若有，则使用已存在的图层作为运动尾迹

translations.source: Creates a new layer for the trails.
Try to set a nice animation exposure based on the property velocities.
translations.translation: 尝试基于属性的速度创建漂亮的摄影表。
向表达式中添加前序循环
向表达式中添加后续循环
将赛璐璐创建为新图层

translations.source: Creates cels as new paint effects on a single layer
translations.translation: 将赛璐璐创建为单个图层的笔画效果
吸附正向动力学至反向动力学

translations.source: Aligns FK rotation values to current IK.
translations.translation: 将正向动力学的旋转值对齐至当前的反向动力学。
吸附反向动力学至正向动力学

translations.source: Aligns IK position value to current FK.
translations.translation: 将反向动力学位的置值对齐至当前的反向动力学

translations.source:
Organization

Duik is a comprehensive tool set for rigging and animation. This means there are a lot of tools available, but they are categorized in some useful panels, depending on what you're doing (animating, rigging, using cameras...)

Each panel can be displayed by clicking on one of the top buttons.
The first button, on the left, opens a very simple yet useful notes editor.

The other buttons display the available panels:

- Rigging
- Animation
- Camera
- Import and Export tools
- Settings
- Help

Help

If you need help, click on the top right button to open the contextual help, or hold the [Shift] button on your keyboard while clicking on any button to get some help.
Add a structure, on selected path/pins/layers if any.
Ungulate (horses, cattle, girafes, pigs, deers, camels, hippopotamuses...)
Removes expressions and effect for controlling the appearance of the Structure.\nThis will improve performance a little bit.
Auto-link bezier paths to Structure elements.
Auto-link puppet pins to Structure elements.
Parent layers to the last selected one
Add a \"zero\" to a layer.\nAlt + Click: Resets the PRS of the layer
Locks the property so its value can not be changed nor keyframed
Separates the dimensions of the property in an effect
Removes expressions and effect for controlling the appearance of the Bone.\nThis will improve performance a little bit.
Tag the selected layers as controllers
Removes expressions and effect for controlling the appearance of the Controller.\nThis will improve performance a little bit.
Align two (or more) layers together.\nAll selected layers will be aligned to the last selected one.
(Un)parent the children of the layer(s) to be able to adjust the transformation of the layer(s) without affecting the children.
Removes the expressions of the selected properties/layers, keeping the post-expression value.
Align the positions of the layers
Align the orientations of the layers
Align the scales of the layers
Align the opacities of the layers
All selected layers will be aligned\nto the last selected one.
The number of dimensions of the property
The expression link to the property (from the layer)
The minimum value during the animation.
The maximum value during the animation.
The maximum velocity during the animation.
The average velocity during the animation.
Blends different animations together,\nin an event-driven way.
